pageContext.claim: “New York authorities released illegal aliens who were previously charged with assault, criminal possession of a weapon, possession of poisonous drugs, and strangling a person — in each case, New York officials had refused to turn these dangerous illegal aliens over to ICE or notify ICE about their release with enough time for them to be safely arrested.”
pageContext.analysis: On March 10, Trump devoted his weekly address to sanctuary cities and illegal immigration. ICE ultimately arrested all four of these individuals anyway. According to information provided by the White House, ICE had filed detainer requests for only three of these four individuals. It's worth noting that crime has been declining steadily in New York for years.
